scenes.description: Tsunomaki Watame performs the ending of her song "My song".
A highlight montage of the live plays with the climax of "My song".
Watame talks to the audience about the future and introduces the final song.
Watame performs her new song, "Happy day to you!".

subtitles.original: …もがいた
subtitles.english: …struggled

subtitles.original: 小さくて頼りなくて不安定な歩幅が
subtitles.english: Small, unreliable, and unstable steps

subtitles.original: つながって歌になる 僕を聞いてくれ
subtitles.english: Connect to become a song, please listen to me

subtitles.original: みんな、ありがとう！
subtitles.english: Everyone, thank you!

subtitles.original: 1回10回100回1000回 挑戦は続けるよ まだ足りない 手を待ってる
subtitles.english: 1 time, 10 times, 100 times, 1000 times, I'll keep on challenging. Not enough yet, waiting for hands.

subtitles.original: 止まない雨の中
subtitles.english: In the unending rain

subtitles.original: ずっと考えて考えて考えて見つけ出した
subtitles.english: Kept thinking, thinking, and thinking until I found it

subtitles.original: 僕だけの正解を証明したいんだよな
subtitles.english: I want to prove my very own answer

subtitles.original: もし辿り着いたなら 誇っていいかな
subtitles.english: If I reach it, can I be proud of myself?

subtitles.original: 4年目も一緒に歩いていこうね。
subtitles.english: Let's walk together in our 4th year too.

subtitles.original: 最後の曲です。
subtitles.english: This is the last song.

subtitles.original: 聴いてください。
subtitles.english: Please listen to it.

subtitles.original: 新曲、Happy day to you!
subtitles.english: My new song, Happy day to you!

subtitles.original: Happy day to you!
subtitles.english: Happy day to you!

subtitles.original: 作詞：角巻わため 作曲・編曲：堀江晶太
subtitles.english: Lyrics: Tsunomaki Watame / Composition & Arrangement: Horie Shouta

subtitles.original: 今日は年に一度 特別な日
subtitles.english: Today is a special day once a year

subtitles.original: 君と一緒に今お祝いをしよう
subtitles.english: Let's celebrate with you now

subtitles.original: ケーキの上 ローソク 火をつけて
subtitles.english: Light the candles on top of the cake

subtitles.original: おめでとう！ 笑顔が溢れるよ
subtitles.english: Congratulations! Smiles are overflowing

subtitles.original: 産まれてきたこと
subtitles.english: The fact that you were born

subtitles.original: それは偶然？ 奇跡かもしれない
subtitles.english: Is it a coincidence? Or maybe a miracle

subtitles.original: でもせっかくなら 日々をもっと
subtitles.english: But if we have the chance, let's make the days more...

subtitles.original: happy! enjoy! さあ行こう！
subtitles.english: happy! enjoy! Let's go!

subtitles.original: 雲の綿菓子食べてみたり
subtitles.english: Trying to eat cotton candy clouds

subtitles.original: 魔法を使って空を飛んだり
subtitles.english: Using magic to fly through the sky

subtitles.original: 誰かを救うヒーローになったり
subtitles.english: Becoming a hero who saves someone

subtitles.original: なんでもできそうな気がするね
subtitles.english: I feel like I can do anything

subtitles.original: そんな奇跡みたいな日々を
subtitles.english: Those miracle-like days

subtitles.original: ずっと もっと
subtitles.english: Always and more

subtitles.original: なんでもない日々は意地悪で
subtitles.english: The ordinary days are unkind

subtitles.original: くちびる噛みしめる時もあるよね
subtitles.english: There are times when you bite your lip

subtitles.original: 落ち込んでへこんで浮かない顔
subtitles.english: Feeling down, depressed, and looking blue

subtitles.original: 大丈夫 笑顔がこぼれるよ
subtitles.english: It's okay, a smile will come out

subtitles.original: 産まれてきたこと
subtitles.english: The fact that you were born

subtitles.original: それを後悔しちゃう日もあるかもしれない
subtitles.english: There might be days when you regret it

subtitles.original: でもせっかくなら 日々をもっと
subtitles.english: But if we have the chance, let's make the days more...

subtitles.original: happiness! joyful! ほら行こう！
subtitles.english: happiness! joyful! See, let's go!

subtitles.original: 小さな幸せ積み上げて
subtitles.english: Piling up small happinesses

subtitles.original: 世界で一つだけの宝物
subtitles.english: The only treasure in the world

subtitles.original: 君が生きた証 抱きしめて
subtitles.english: Embrace the proof that you lived

subtitles.original: 産まれてきてくれてありがとう
subtitles.english: Thank you for being born

subtitles.original: 君も、そこの君も一緒に
subtitles.english: You too, and the you over there, together

subtitles.original: 同じ時代に生まれた奇跡たち
subtitles.english: The miracles born in the same era

subtitles.original: 来年も再来年も一緒に
subtitles.english: Together next year and the year after too

subtitles.original: ここで笑ってお祝いしよう
subtitles.english: Let's laugh and celebrate here

subtitles.original: そんな奇跡みたいな日々を
subtitles.english: Those miracle-like days

subtitles.original: ずっと もっと
subtitles.english: Always and more
